translations: 担负；使载重；加重压于；加负担于；使烦恼（burden 的现在分词）

phrs.translation: 举证责任；提供证据之责任
n. 财政负担，经济负担

sentences.sentence: This will achieve greater security without unduly burdening the consumers or the economy.
sentences.translation: 这将获得更大的安全而没有给消费者或经济过度增加负担。

sentences.sentence: This last finding would appear to contradict another popular hypothesis that it is our burdening of students with assignments that is causing all the problems.
sentences.translation: 最后这一发现似乎与另一种流行的假设相矛盾，即我们给学生的作业负担正导致了所有的问题。

sentences.sentence: During the Engineering stage we try to avoid burdening the users with change control procedures.
sentences.translation: 在工程阶段期间，我们试图避免通过改变控制程序加重用户的负担。
